channel.title: Need a little help, reward if you can help :)
channel.description:
ok, i have everything done for my server, except one thing. When i try and run runserver.bat i get [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command Press any key to continue...[/code]
or i get a screen that pops up for like a mili second and then closes.
1. I have the latest version of Jre i think(jre1.6.0_5) 2. I have the latest version of Jdk i think(jdk1.6.0_20) 3. I have jre6 4. I think i set my CLASSPATH and PATH correct but i am unsure. 5. I have teamviewer if that will be easier
[b][u]Rewards[/u][/b] 1. I can pay in real money(U.S.D) 2. I can give you staff spots on my server if i ever get it up :S 3. I can give an rs acc if need be.
PLEASE HELP WITH ANY INFO!!!
[b]1st person to give me info that works, or goes on teamviewer with me and fixes it, get their choice of reward.[/b]

item.title: Need a little help, reward if you can help :)
item.dc:creator: @WiseMen WiseMen
item.description:
@WiseMen wrote:

Right click > edit > change the 0_## to your JDR/JDK.

That should do it, or maybe update your Java.

EDIT; I’ll go on your teamviewer, and help you. Pm me your ID & pass

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little help, reward if you can help :)
